title: Follow our Twitter account
description: Please follow @KOLNetwork and make sure your follow is publicly visible. After completion, please provide a screenshot or your Twitter username as proof.

title: Complete all social media engagement tasks
description: This is a comprehensive task that requires completing all interactions including follow, like, retweet, comment, and quote. High rewards upon completion.

title: Comment and quote our tweet
description: Please comment your thoughts on this tweet and quote retweet: https://twitter.com/KOLNetwork/status/987654321

title: Follow and like our latest tweet
description:
1. Follow @Web3Project
2. Like our pinned tweet
3. Provide screenshot proof

title: Retweet and comment on our event tweet
description:
Join our airdrop event:
1. Retweet the event tweet
2. Comment with #KOLNetwork #Airdrop
3. Provide tweet link
